0.dialouge: Ey Malo!~ Long time no see man!
0.speaker: Melantha

0.dialouge: Who is that punk you've got with you.
0.speaker: Melantha

1.dialouge:
Oh he's Klay,~ a classmate of mine.~
Klay...~ this is Melantha.~
She can be a bit rude at times.
1.speaker: Malo

2.dialouge: She is a fan of that emo band you always listen to.~ Eldritch Blight was it?
2.speaker: Malo

0.dialouge: Thanks a million!~ You're a real life saver man!
0.speaker: Melantha

0.dialouge: You could have at least introduced yourself you know.
0.speaker: Malo

1.dialouge: Why?~ You did a perfectly good job introducing me.
1.speaker: Klay

2.dialouge:
And you were the one that forced me to come.~
What did you hand her anyways?
2.speaker: Klay

6.dialouge:
Yeah!~
Melantha is a garderner~ she collects rare flowers from different parts of the pillar.
6.speaker: Malo

8.dialouge:
So...~
Are we gonna leave now?
8.speaker: Klay

9.dialouge:
Leave?~
We just got here Klay!
9.speaker: Malo

10.dialouge: We can't just leave after coming all this way.
10.speaker: Malo

11.dialouge: But the selection is tomorrow Malo!
11.speaker: Klay

12.dialouge: That's exactly why we must enjoy ourselves now.~ It's not even noon yet.~ We have plenty of time.
12.speaker: Malo

13.dialouge: Plus,~ wandering around the pillar alone is against the rules so it's not like you have a choice.
13.speaker: Malo

1.dialouge:
These are two pieces of Twin Quartz.~
The light given off by one piece will always point to the other.
1.speaker: Malo

2.dialouge: Very cool Malo.~ Can we go now?
2.speaker: Klay

3.dialouge: Alright alright...~ Learn to have a little fun okay.
3.speaker: Malo
